meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: The reading can be either the kun'yomi or on'yomi reading, so you have a choice there. Let's learn the わた reading, though. Just think <reading>what</reading> (わた) is cotton? What is it? What does it mean? Ask a lot of "what" questions about cotton to yourself.
